member.name: T:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton
member.summary:
Defines button control for generating WiX Button element.
The can be used with the designer to define custom dialog layouts. The uses instance at compile time to generate WiX Button element on the base of this instance properties.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.Conditions
member.summary: Gets or sets the control conditions.

member.name: M:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.WixSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the Control.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.WixLocation
member.summary: Gets the Control location.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.Actions
member.summary: Gets the actions associated with the WiX Control.

member.name: E:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.Click
member.summary: Occurs when triggers it in order to generate WiX XML for the control action(s).

member.name: M:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.PerformClick
member.summary: Generates a event for a button.
member.remarks: Because WixSharp UI controls are used only at compile time to generate WiX actions XML the events are raised/triggered by the but not by the user at runtime (deployment time).

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the Control Id.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.Tooltip
member.summary: Gets or sets the Control tooltip.

member.summary: Gets or sets the bound property name.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.Hidden
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is hidden.

member.name: P:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.WixAttributes
member.summary: Gets or sets the WiX attributes.

member.name: M:WixSharp.Controls.WixButton.ToWControl
member.summary: Converts the WinForm control into WiX custom UI control .
